choices: He's in a field near Birdy
He's in bed next to a large male dragon (Original character)
1.content:
(Before I start, the story must remain in the third person. Any second or first person chapters will be edited to be third person)

If one has felt a migrane before, then you know you never want to experience a pain like that ever again. However, a migrane is nothing compared to a hangover.

Conker slowly opened his eyes, but doing so sent bolts of pain through his head, so he shut them again. Lazily, he brought his paws to his head and rubbed it hard, trying to stop the pain flowing through his skull. If he were to tell someone how he was feeling, he'd surely say "like a badger's ass". The pain was unbearable and virtually undescribable. How could one describe the pain Conker was feeling? There was no word for it.

As he moved a bit, hazy memories flowed through his mind, but the only thing he could remember clearly was going to his favorite pub, still depressed over the loss of Berri, his former girfriend who was on the wrong end of a Tommy gun. After that, things were a drunken blurr.

Finally, he gathered the courage to open his eyes, but not before expelling some of the poisen inside him through his mouth. The acidic taste of his vomit littered his mouth and he wanted nothing more than to get the taste off his tongue. As his bloodshot eyes finally opened up, the squirrel took a look at his surroundings.
1.title: Hang Over

choices: Conker walks in a random direction;  ends up in intestines
Conker walks in a random  direction; ends up in a throat
Conker walks in a random direction; he meets someone in the stomach
Conker decides to stay in the stomach
11.content:
Conker looked around in the dim light. He couldn't tell where the light was coming from, but he had more pressing matters to worry about...like, who was beating on a drum so goddamn loud so early in the morning? His surroundings didn't tell him much..nor did his mind since he was in the fog of the mother of all hangovers. After a minute or two, Conker decided to stand up on the squishy ground. He was able to get up, but his short legs were unsteady. He felt like throwing up more poison, but Conker managed to keep it down. It took him another minute to realize where he was; he was in a stomach! The lack of sunlight and of windows told him that much...not to mention the squishy ground and that drum beat that was the heartbeat of whoever...or whatever...had eaten him. He tried to remember who or what had eaten him....but his memory was still fuzzy. He did remember playing poker with a snake at one point....but the stomach didn't seem to belong to a snake...unless it was a BIG snake. If he was in a stomach, Conker didn't understand how he was still alive.
The light he saw earlier was coming from a lamp post about 15 feet away from him.
"What is a lamp post doing in here?" asked Conker aloud.
Right at the bottom of the lamp post, stood a rather short man in a black robe. He walked unsteadily to the lamp post and towards the little man.
"CONKER!" said the man in a deep booming voice. "YOUR TIME IS....." suddenly, the man was overcome with a coughing fit. "goddamn cat!"
"Who're you?" asked Conker.
"I'm Gregg" said the man. "and don't laugh at my size! Anyway...this is for you" Gregg held out a pill.
"What's this do?" asked Conker, taking the pill and looking at it.
"Just take the bloodly thing and you'll understand" said Gregg, "and now...if you don't mind..I'm out of here...I can't stand cats...." Here, Gregg vanished into thin air, but the lamp post was still there.
Conker shrugged and took the pill. In a matter of seconds, his hangover was gone...but his memory was still hazy.
"That fills loads better!" said Conker happily. "now...I suppose I need to get out of here"
11.title: The Miracle Hangover Cure

12.content:
Conker yawned and saw that he was sitting on his bed, the room pasted with posters of Berri that he cut out of the magazines she used to pose for before she met Conker. He sighed happily as he saw he was finally home, falling back into his bed. At least now he knew how to easily get rid of his hangover.

The squirrel reached over for his dresser and pulled out a draw, containing bottles of pills. Taking one, he popped it into his mouth and swallowed it, his hangover instantly going away. "I love those things." he said to himself before he hopped out of of bed.

After a quick breakfast of cereal, the red furred squirrel sighed and placed his head on his fist, missing Berri and wishing she was sitting across the table from him like she usually would. His tail wagged slowly behind him and he watched the clock tick away. "I have to do something. I can't sit around here all day." He said out loud, getting away from the table.

As he headed out the front door, he stopped, not really knowing where to go. "Hmm...I could go down to the Cock and Plucker and see the guys. I'm sure there's a huge party to celebrate the war's end." He said in his mind, looking down the path towards the bar.

"Or I could go for a walk in the park or something."
12.title: Home Sweet Home

choices: I need to use the bathroom
121.content:
Conker decided to head on down to the Cock and Plucker to see the guys who fought with him in the Tediz war. It was still pretty late at night, so perhaps the party was still going on. The squirrel made a left at the path and headed towards the bar, looking down at the ground. "At least it's not raining tonight." He thought to himself, folding his arms.

The miserable squirrel stopped in front of the bar, the monk still standing outside reading from his tablet. He paid no attention to the squirrel as he made his way into the bar, and just as Conker thought, a massive party was going on inside, drunken squirrel soldiers singing off-key to the band playing, Gregg asking a female soldier what she thought of cats, cavemen being chased by the drunken Sergeant who thought they were Tediz, and someone Conker hadn't seen before was sitting at a table drinking water. Conker thought it might be good to sit next to what he guessed was a dragon after he got his drink.

The squirrel approached the huge bartender and ordered his usual. A drunken Rodent stumbled over and ordered another drink. "Hey, *hic* Conker! This...this stuff is great!" He said, not even knowing that Conker had just arrived.

Conker nodded and sipped from his beer. "Yeah, it is.." he replied with a sigh.

Rodent burped and took another swig, wrapping his skinny arm around Conker. "Hey, come sit with us!" He slurred, stumbling towards his table.

Conker broke free and looked towards the dragon sitting by himself, then looked over to the table filled with vomitting, drunken squirrels. He didn't know whether to join them, or the dragon.
121.title: The Cock and Plucker

1211.content:
"Ok i will join you" said Conker

"*HIc* great" said Conker.

Both squirrels approached the table and the squirrel sit there were unconscious and under the table in their own vomit. "Typical" thought Conker.

"Ok Conker *Hic* since none is seeing or hearing us can i tell a secret?" asked Rodent.

"Eeeh.. It depends. Is it important?" said Conker a bit afraid.

"Yes it is. It can help us to win the next war *Hic*. It's a weapon"

"Really? But i have to go home..." stared to said Conker.

"To stay alone? C'mon you will see that it really works *Hic" said Rodent

"Well..."

*" I really gonna be sorry about this" thought Conker.

As they finished their drinks and paid for them conker went to Rodent's home: a military tree base that looked like a lab ratter than a tree.

"So this is where you live?" asked Conker.

"Yeah. Why?" said Rodent.

"Nothing" said Conker. "Where the hell did he get the money to build this?" thought Conker.

They entered to it and then Conker watch a gun like weapon in the center of a room.

"Here it is" said rodent.

"It shrinks things"

"In this podium?"

"Yes"

Conker pushed the button and a red ray zap him and ...
12111.title: Rodent's house, invention and problems.

121111.content:
After the zap you see... a big world!!!

"Oh no. Why does it have to work? said conker as he realized what happened.

Rodent used magnifying to look for Conker in the podium."There you are" he said as he picked up Conker.

"I gonna be famous and we are gonna win any war2 said happily Rodent.

"Yep yep Ok. Now that we see that your machine works. Can you grow me again?" asked Conker.

"Grow again? Uh-oh."

"What?"

"I didn't invent a growing machine" confessed Rodent.

"WHAT!!!!!!!" shouted Conker angrily.

"Sorry. I didn't thought it will be necessary."

"This is what i get when i'm nice to a friend" thought Conker.

"You better find a way or do something to fix this" said Conker.

"You know i really like you as a friend" said Rodent.

"What do you mean with that?" asked Conker.

"I will do something. Believe me" said Rodent sarcastically.

"And that will be..." asked Conker, afraid of the answer.
121111.title: A big Rodent

1211111.content:
"Having a dinner with you" said Rodent

"OK" Said conker "It's worst than i feared and expected. What a stupid idea" thought.

"In that case, what we are we gonna have for dinner" asked conker

"You will see. You will see" said Rodent.

Rodent putted conker in the table and go to the kitchen to cook a tasty dinner for him and Conker. Meanwhile Conker saw all the house. It was rustically but with modern technology. Also it has a furniture with many badges given only with military service. Then he thought "hope this will not in another accident or f***** problems with him. At least i'm going to eat"

Rodent came back with a big beef and a bottle of wine. It smelled delicious, and it doesn't looked so bad.

"Well let's get to eat" said Rodent.

After 20 minutes of chewing and swallowing pieces of meat, the beef disappeared.

"Burp. Sorry." said both squirrels.

"I'm still hungry" said Rodent.

"So? What are we gonna have for dessert" asked Conker.

Rodent thought "Do I do it now or I will wait until tomorrow?"
1211111.title: Having dinner. The menu of this night is

12111111.content:
"Maybe now is the best moment" decided Rodent.

"So what it will be?" asked Conker.

"Well, it is complicated. Do you like chocolate?"

"I enjoy it. It gives me energy so I don't have to use "my chances of living""

"Well i guess it is my lucky day. I will dip you in chocolate and eat you. I like it that way specially with milk." applied Rodent.

"Eeeh, can you repeat it? That last part of being covered by chocolate and get eaten by you?" Then he stared to laugh of him. "Oh yeah. What a big joke. You eating Me!!!. How funny." But the serious look of Rodent vanished Conker's laugh. "So... you were talking seriously."

"Yeah now come here" said Rodent.

"Oh look at the time I have to go" said Conker.

But Conker wasn't fast enough and was grabbed by Rodent. He then dipped Conker in pool of chocolate. "Mmm... delicious" thought Conker as he licked himself.

Then he was pulled upper to Rodent's mouth and the Conker said "Wait. Why are you doing this?"

"Remember when I blasted the windmill and i told you my feelings about you?" said Rodent "You call me an idiot"

"Well yes. Everyone thinks that." said Conker.

"Ok that's it. Nice to meet you in the bar and thanks for saving my life in war but i hope next time you choose better the words you want to use to describe someone." said Rodent.

"Wait we can fix it. I can pay you"

"Nice try."

After saying all of this, Rodent opened his mouth and put Conker inside. Rodent stared to lick the chocolate thinking it was delicious. And finally (the moment we have waiting for) he begins to swallow. Conker grabs his tongue but it is to slippery and it's pulled into Rodent's throat.

Then with a loud GULP Conker begins to fall inside Rodent's stomach.

"*Burp* Sorry." said Rodent as he stared to fell a little sleepy and tired.

"Well that was a nice dessert. Maybe I should go to sleep"

Meanwhile Conker stared to be digested with the acids.

Now choose the next action.
12111111.title: A chocolate-squirrel dessert.

choices: Conker gets a little drunk, and horny
1212.content:
"I'm going to sit with that dragon." Conker told Rodent, who let go of the red squirrel.

"Ok, it's...*Hic* your funeral!" Rodent replied before joining his comrades.

Conker approached the green dragon with blond bed-head style hair, two golden horns appearing out of his hair, and wearing army pants and an army shirt, but wore a black vest. "Mind if I sit with you?" Conker asked, noticing he was a lot shorter than this dragon.

The dragon turned and looked at him. "Sure, why not?" he replied, pushing out a chair for Conker to sit on.

As the squirrel sat down, he noticed the dragon was in fact, drinking water, and a Tommy gun sat on the table, looking as if it was about to fall over. Unlike the Tommy Gun that Conker was used to seeing, this one had a block grip instead of a pistol grip on the barrel, and a stick clip instead of a drum clip. "I'm Major FT of the 202nd Airborne Infantry Division. We dropped behind the beach you squirrel guys stormed tonight. Unfortunately, most of my squad was killed." The dragon said, sipping his water.

Conker nodded and sighed. "It was like that on the beach as well. Were your guys all dragons?" He asked, taking another chug of his beer.

FT nodded and leaned on the table some. "The squirrels allied with us, but were pretty untrustworthy of us, so they sent us behind the lines. Our unit was scattered all over the coast and I found about 20 or so of my guys. By the time we reached the beachhead, there was about 9 of us. By that time, we met up with the squirrel's 99th Airborne and cut off the Tediz retreat, but I lost the last 8 of my squad in the gunfight." FT continued, almost finishing his water.

Conker looked a bit shocked and ordered another beer. "Sounds like a tough fight. Why are you drinking water? You might feel better drinking a beer." Conker asked, reaching out for his second mug.

FT shook his head. "Nah. I don't really drink." He explained, wagging his arrow-tipped tail.

The squirrel nodded his head and quickly finished up his second drink. "After I got back to Windy, I met up with my girlfriend and were forced at gunpoint to rob a bank." He began, lying a bit to make him seem more innocent.

The dragon smirked and held up a picture of the weasel who killed Berri. "By this guy?" FT asked.

Conker looked away from the photo. "Yeah, he later killed my girlfriend when the heist turned into a trap set by the Panther King." Conker finished, sighing sadly.

The Major grinned and petted Conker on the head. "Yeah, we picked him up as he was escaping the bank. He tried to fire on us, but I acted first and filled him full of lead with this." FT said, patting the Thompson on the table.

Conker smiled and gave the dragon a hug. "Thanks, I was hoping something like that would happen to him." He replied, then asked for another beer.
1212.title: Meet Maj. FT

12121.content:
Conker had stuck around the dragon for a while, having drink after drink and getting to know the dragon better. They had instantly become friends, and now Conker was beginning to have sexual desires. "Damn, there's never a girl around when you need one." Conker said, still able to speak clearly.

FT chuckled and pointed to the female soldier and was about to suggest her, but then Gregg, annoyed with her attitude and like of cats, tapped her on the forehead, harvesting her soul. "Yep, there's no longer any girls here." FT said, looking up and down Conker's body.

Conker didn't notice this and sighed, holding his head with his arms. "Dammit, I wish Berri was still alive."

The dragon nodded and stroked up and down Conker's back. "I know how you feel...but have you ever considered...doing it with another guy?" FT asked, admitting that he had become quite attracted to Conker.

Maybe it was the effects of the beer, losing Berri, or being unable to get rid of his urges, or maybe all of the above, but Conker began to consider doing what FT had just asked him. "I dunno...part of me is curious, but I don't think someone's dick in my ass is gonna feel very good." Conker replied, clenching his butt at the thought of the pain.

FT smiled and pulled Conker over to his lap, secretly pushing his pants down over his legs and pulling his legs out of his pants. "Just relax and it'll feel just fine. I'll make it slow as possible." FT replied, licking Conker's cheek.

Conker whimpered and relaxed himself, pushing his tail aside a bit. "Ok...I'll try it...but if it hurts, I want you to stop right away." Conker said, sipping from his beer.

Just as he was about to, FT thrusted his hips, the dragon's cock slowly sliding into Conker. "Hey, I'm trying to drink here....oooh, that does feel good..." Conker exclaimed, spilling his beer.

FT grinned and held Conker close, purring as his cock slid deeper into the squirrel's tailhole. "I told you it would."

Their act had been spotted by the bartender, who became angry. "Hey! How many times have I told you NO having sex in MY bar!" He shouted, causing a drunken squirrel with a bandage on his arm to look up.

"And don't have your gun on the table like that! I don't want to get shot again!" He shouted, noting that the slightest movement would have knocked the gun right off the table.

FT sighed and hilted, letting Conker get used to the feeling of his cock inside his furry rump. "You wanna stay here or go back to my place?" FT asked, kissing Conker's cheek.
12121.title: Conker gets a little drunk, and horny

choices: Wakes up in bed next to FT

Conker opened his eyes and looked at everyone staring at him. Thankfully they were drunk and would probably forget this had happened. "Let's go back to your place...I don't want to get kicked out of here."

FT nodded and pulled Conker off his cock, putting his pants on, and carried the drunk squirrel in his arms. "Alright then." FT replied.

Conker found himself on all fours on the dragon's bed, moaning as the naked dragon thrusted in and out of his rear, gripping his hips and moaning himself, nuzzling the back of the squirrel's head. "You liking this?" FT asked, groaning as he pushed his member deeper into Conker.

The squirrel nodded quickly, clenching his tight, virgin tailhole around FT's cock. "Yeah...I can't believe it does...does this make me gay?" Conker asked, looking back at the dragon.

FT smirked and nodded. "Yeah, but if you still like girls, then you'd be bisexual, like me." FT explained, purring as arching his back as his pleasure built up inside him.

"I kinda do...but I'm liking this better..." Conker admitted, blushing deeply.

The dragon giggled and then moaned deeply as he thrusted forward hard, his cock twitching before releasing its seed deep into the squirrel's anus, Conker squealing in pleasure as he felt the dragon's spooge burst into his tight little rump. 124.content: Conker thought "I should go see Birdy, he's always good for a laugh or two!
124.title: Visit Birdy

choices: A snake pops up from the ground
Conker pulls out a beer bottle
Conker pulls out a salt shaker
Conker activates some kind of sex machine
13.content:
Conker's eyes adjusted as he found himself in another familiar place. He was in the same spot he was the last time this happened. "Oh no...it's gonna be another one of those days." He said just like last time.

Conker slowly rose to his feet and stumbled across the field, holding his pounding head. He remembered Birdy stood just on the other side of the field, but the gate next to the context sensitive pad was open. However, the pad wasn't activated. The squirrel entered through the opening and stumbled up to Birdy. The scarecrow was of course, asleep and muttering curses in his sleep.

Conker slowly approached the context senstive button in front of Birdy, but before he could reach it, the scarecrow rose from his slumber. "Feck off."

The words sounded like thunder in Conker's head, causing him to moan and clutch his head. "Hung over again, is yeh? Need help to go home again? Well, step over he-er and make the ting noise!" He said, gesturing for Conker to step onto the context senstive pad.

Conker slowly climbed onto the pad and screamed as the ting noise made his head ache...like a badger's ass. "Yeah, ting! Um, press X." Birdy instructed.

"X? Thought it was B?" Conker said looked down and saw a large "B" written on the pad.

"Oh yeah, B. I still drunk from last time." He said, chuckling.

Conker was a little annoyed and bent down, putting his paws to the B and pressing down. It worked and something had happened.
13.title: Visiting Beardy, err Birdy, again.

choices: Go out to the waterfall and make it up to the bridge
132.content:
Conker's head turned to see the second pad through the gate open up, so he picked up his feet and stumbled toward it. Along the way, he had to bend over and vomit, staining the grass with the disgusting fluid. He moaned and hoped the pad did what it did last time.

As he pressed down on B, the pad produced a white tablet and some water. Conker dropped the tablet in the water and swallowed the entire glass down, tossing the empty glass behind him. Just as expected, the tablet got rid of his horrible hang over. "Wow, now I feel loads better! You know, I should really give up drinking." The squirrel said to himself.

Conker sighed happily and turned around. "Hmm. Now what should I do? Should I do what I did last time or should I go talk to Birdy and see if he has any useful information to tell me." He thought to himself.

"Wait, why am I saying "tell me". He doesn't tell, he sells!" Conker said, sighing.

It was an obvious choice for him to make.
132.title: No more hang over!

choices: The Gargoyle (he's looking for some payback)
Come up with an original threat
1321.content:
Conker was initially going to avoid talking to Birdy again, feeling that anything he had to tell him wouldn't be worth it, and worse would come at a price. Not that money was a problem for King Conker - it had a way of coming back to him. So Conker tried going up the path over the Waterfall to get back to the cross-roads. However suddenly, Birdy appeared out of the ground blocking his bath.

"Uhhh, wait there - hold on there uh, Mr. Squirrel-guy; I gots something real important to tell you," Birdy said with his raspy voice.

"Oh, yeah I'm sure...And I guess its going to cost me a few bucks, eh?" Conker asked.

"No, Don't matter; I got...tell you...real important," Birdy said.

"Oh, okay cool. So what is it?" Conker asked.

"Uh...what was it...was it again? Oh - oh yeah; you...squirrel...Big trouble, yeah; danger ahead," Birdy said.

"Trouble? Danger? What kind of Danger?" Conker asked.

"Uh...who now was it uh...Oh yeah; lotta people...the people you helped in your last adventure...Well they uh...they have a grudge against you."

"A grudge?" Conker asked. "Why would they have a grudge against me? I did help them out after all."

"Uh...I think...maybe uh...You did not do good job at helping them," Birdy said. "Now...they want revenge."

"Pfeh...they want revenge," Conker said. "I doubt there's anything I can't handle; I mean what can they do to me? I'm the King."

"Well...whatever," Birdy said. "I go to bed now...Good luck and...nice knowing you." With that, Birdy disappeared again.

"Ah what does he know...I don't think I'm in any kind of danger," Conker said. "After everything I went through last time, I think I deserve a good day for once. Plus, I really doubt that any of the losers I helped out last time would really be in such a vindictive mood. And even if they do, what can they really do to me?" Conker then began to walk off toward the waterfall. "Danger - what a laugh. Who would want to read a story about me getting into some kind of danger?"

What is the first bit of trouble that Conker encounters along the way?
1321.title: An Ominous Warning

choices: In the Wasp's nest, in a Honey-Comb waist deep in Honey
In a Pot of boiling water
Tied up on a silver platter
13211.content:
Conker traveled down the path, picking up some anti-gravity chocolate along the way. He came to the fork in the road and took a survey of his surroundings.

"Ugh here we go again," he said. "Wait, why did I even come here? In fact, I'm almost certain that this is nowhere near where my home is...Course I'm not going home. I got to get back to the castle; they probably want me to sign some new treaty or something boring like that."
Conker was back to feeling sorry for himself again; he missed his home, he missed Berri. Ever since he became King he didn't really get a chance to just be himself anymore; aside from sneaking off and going to the Cock and Plucker. But at least Conker knew that the Castle was close to here; in fact it should be just over the horizon.

However when Conker went to look up, he noticed that many things in this little crossroads had changed. The windmill was still gone, but they cleaned up all of the debris that it left. He saw that the small Beehive was gone; Conker had a moment of pause as he remembered the state of the hive and the Queen Bee when the windmill got hit. But its not like it was his fault; it was War after all.

But many other things had changed. It looked like Dunghill mountain had gotten bigger; fecking dirty Dung Beatles; disgusting. He also noticed that the farm area seemed a bit more...overgrown than last time with wild vines and more sunflowers. And most astonishing of all, the Wasp's nest was enormous, towering over the skyline and blocking the view of the castle. In fact the giant yellow structure looked more like a castle itself, and was overflowing with honey. There was more buzzing sound coming from out of there.

"Huh...looks like those wasps have been doing well for themselves," Conker said. "I guess without the Queen Bee's hive to steal they've really had to step things up for themselves. Probably won't be too happy to see me though; so I better avoid 'em for now."

Little did Conker realize that he was actually being watched very closely by someone nearby. And while Conker was busy pondering to himself out-loud, they slowly crept up behind him.
"Let me see," Conker said. "The best way to the castle; I certainly don't want to go the long way around; don't want to end up at Rock Solid in Ooga-Booga or that Creepy Zombie village again. So maybe I should go to the Feral Reserve Bank; that seemed to get me to the castle last time. Hopefully they fixed that damn rickety bridge; what do they think their taxes are going towards?" Conker then had a sudden moment of realization. "Hey...wait a minute; wasps don't produce honey...what's going on here?"

No sooner than he'd said that, he suddenly heard a faint buzzing sound from right behind him. But before he could turn, he was suddenly hit over the head from behind and he fell over. He was a bit stunned and his head hurt but he wasn't fully blacked out. But he noticed a slender yellow and black body appear over him, and many different legs wrapping around him. He was about to struggle when suddenly he felt a stabbing sensation in his stomach. He'd just been stung. A warm drowsy feeling came over him and he blacked out completely. The last sensation Conker had before falling asleep was being lifted off the ground and carried off.

Where does Conker wake-up?
13211.title: A World Familiar, a World Changed

choices: A hungry shark looking for a squirrel dinner
1322.content:
The choice was simple. Conker decided to just leave the area the same way he did not too long ago. He smiled and slowly approached the water. "Wait!" He heard Birdy call out.

Conker slowly turned around. "What is it, Beardy? I got to get home."

Birdy looked angry. "No, Birdy. I scare birdies! I was gonna warn yeh about deh water, but with dat tone, I'm not gonna tell yeh. Unless, yeh got some Mexipax." Birdy said with a grin.

Conker sighed and turned around. "Sorry, don't have any Mexipax, Birdy." Conker said as he stepped into the water.

Slowly, Conker swam out to the ledge that stood over the waterfall, being careful about how rapid the current got as he got closer to the edge. He figured that's what Birdy was trying to warn him about, so he took caution.

Though it didn't seem so dangerous, the squirrel was approaching the edge pretty easily with no troubles from the current. What else could Birdy have been trying to warn him about?
1322.title: Leaving just like before?

choices: Decides to mount Conker to make him cream filled
13221.content:
The shark eyes the squirrel in the blue hoody swimming through his eyes. The sight of the squirrel made his lips drool with hunger. His stomach growled and the shark swam closer, slurping his toothy jaws.

Conker was oblivious to the shark coming up behind him. The current was getting stronger and was pulling the squirrel closer to the edge of the waterfall. Conker let out a yelp as the current pulled him away from the ledge and pushed him to the water's edge. But before he could fall over the waterfall, something bit down on his tail.

Conker let out another yelp as the thing bit down and pulled him away from the waterfall. He turned around and saw a shark slowly pulling him into safer waters. At first, Conker was a little scared, but warmed up to the shark once he saw that it was saving him. "Thank you, Mister Shark. You saved me." Conker said, spitting out some water that had entered his mouth.

The shark grinned, having no intentions of saving Conker. Slowly, it let go of Conker's tail and swam closer. The shark...
13221.title: Saved?

choices: The shark is unable to digest Conker and lets him go
132211.content:
Conker's eyes went wide as he feet slipped inside the shark's mouth. It grinned and pushed the shoes off his feet with his tongue, slurping over his feet before swallowing up to his legs. The tongue curled around the legs, enjoying the delicious taste of Conker's legs. "Hey! What are you doing?!" Conker screamed, splashing in the water as the shark gulped Conker up to his waist.

The shark did not say a word, just savoring Conker's flavor as the tail whipped his face. He liked the smell it carried and continued swallowing, his tongue slipping under Conker's hoody to continue tasting his fur as the squirrel slipped further inside. "Hey! Stop eating me! I'm not food!" Conker protested, punching his paws into the shark.

They had no effect and one sharp bite forced Conker to stop. No blood had been drawn, but it mentally told Conker to submit...for now.

Conker whimpered as another swallow forced his head into the shark's mouth. The tongue wrapped up his head, coating his head in saliva. Conker flipped the shark's jaws, grabbing onto its teeth for dare life. He could see the world outside slowly disappearing as the shark slowly closed his jaws, taunting his meal.

The tongue tickled Conker's paws, forcing him to let go. Finally, the view of the world was no longer available as the shark's jaws snapped shut. All the squirrel could see were rows of teeth sealing him inside the shark. Conker, in one last desperate attempt, wrapped his arms around the shark's tongue.

Unfortunately, this added to the shark's pleasure as Conker's wonderful taste was pushed into his tongue. The shark suckled on the squirrel, absorbing his flavor before taking the final swallow that forced Conker into his throat. The orange-red squirrel screamed as he slipped down the smelly and wet gullet, curling up in the rotted fish scented stomach.

The squirrel sobbed quietly as he pushed and shoved against the shark's stomach walls, squirming madly as he tried to make it vomit.

The shark, however, was in paradice. He watched his bulging gut squirm and shake as Conker fought inside him, sending bolts of pleasure through his body. The shark licked his lips, rubbing his round stomach with his paw as he swam around slowly, unable to move much with such a large meal. The shark slowly found a place to rest while his meal worked himself to exhaustion, planning to work off Conker himself. It was almost a shame to know the shark was about to lose Conker to the process of digestion. Conker's thoughts as he squirmed were that prehaps he should have decided to talk to Birdy before entering the water...
132211.title: Shark food

1322111.content: Conker slowly digested in the shark. After a few minutes all that was left of him was a few bones and red fur.
1322111.title: Conker is digested

choices: In the water and over the falls
13222.content:
As Conker swam towards the grassy ledge sticking out of the water, the current around him began to push him closer to the water's edge. The squirrel gasped as he was pushed further from the ledge, trying his best to swim for it.

The current was too strong for the little squirrel and all Birdy could do was watch from his perch as the little squirrel struggled against the rapids to reach his destination.

Conker's eyes opened wide as he was only a few feet from the falls, and only a few feet from the ledge. As a last ditch effort, he jumped from the water and used his spinning helicoptery tail thing to try and fly towards the ledge. However, due to the lack of energy from the swimming, he soon found himself plummeting to the ground. But it was hard to tell where he was about to land.
13222.title: You can make it!

choices: The open mouth of a crocodile
132221.content:
Conker let out a defeated sigh as he landed right back in the water. By now, he was too exhausted to keep swimming, so he finally let the current take him over the falls. All he could hope for was something down below to break his fall. Or least have a pretty deep lake to fall into this time.

As Conker went over the falls, Birdy waved goodbye and watched the squirrel go over the water's edge. Conker let out a scream and watched himself plunge to the ground below. The wind rustled his fur as he fell, trying his best to spin his tail to hover all the way down.

As Conker approached the bottom of the falls, his eyes caught his landing zone. It was...
132221.title: Conker over the falls...

choices: Conker is digested and visits Gregg
1322211.content:
As Conker fell, he let out a scream as his eyes were greeted with the open jaws of a hungry crocodile. The squirrel did everything in his power to stop himself from landing in those jaws, but there was no use. Conker landed butt first into the jaws, his tail slipping down into the croc's throat.

Conker struggled in the croc's jaws, trying to keep them from snapping closed around him and crushing him inside. Though the croc had no intentions of crushing the poor, delicious squirrel.

The croc's tongue slapped Conker, tasting the already wet fur of the squirrel, finding the hoody to have a fine flavor itself. Conker whimpered each time the tongue smacked his body, forcing a little more of him into the throat.

Conker's strength wore down and the crocodile was able to close its jaws further around Conker. The squirrel moaned and started to sob quietly, wishing he had more strength to prevent himself from becoming croc food.

Once the croc had learned that he had defeated his meal, the croc titled his head back. With a powerful swallow, the squirrel was reduced to a series of lumps in the croc's neck as Conker slid down the pulsating gullet and into the waiting stomach.

The croc licked over its scaley lips as it relaxed in the water, looking at its round tummy, purring softly once Conker began to squirm. The croc let out a satisfied belch, flipping over onto its back and rubbing the bulge with a paw.

Conker curled up as much as he could in the rancid smelling stomach, the flesh surrounding him and hugging him tightly. He pushed the walls away from him as much as he could, but they kept coming back. Soon the stomach gurgled and Conker knew what was coming next. He looked sick and vomitted for the third time in less than an hour. Finally, it came.
1322211.title: And into the jaws of a croc

choices: At the bottom of the falls, next to the sleeping croc
Sleeping by Queen Bee's duct taped hive,
13222112.content:
Conker yelped in pain as the croc's stomach acids poured into the stomach, ready to break down the squirrel. In retaliation, the squirrel struggled to get away from the rising liquid, pleasuring the predator surrounding him greatly.

Conker screamed again and pounded on the stomach walls. "Help me! Get me out of this damn stomach! Let me out you rotten little whelp!" Conker protested, letting out a yelp as his tail was slowly dissolved into bone.

His shoes came next, breaking away from his feet before the fur and skin were eaten off his flesh by the acidic fluid surrounding him. Conker whined as the rest of his fur began to fall out, burning up inside the stomach.

The croc belched again, his breath smelling of digesting squirrel as it laid back to sleep off its meal, not caring for the life ending inside him. With another slurp of its lips and a burp that shook the earth, the croc fell into a deep sleep, and so did Conker. Unfortunately, it would be a sleep Conker would not wake up from. Well, actually, he did.

Conker's eyes opened up as he found himself in a place he recognized. It was a dark, blue-gray stone structure. He called it Gregg's place. And sure enough, the tiny Grim Reaper with a gold tooth stepped out from the darkness. "Oh, it's you again. What the bloody hell do you want?" He shouted, clutching his scythe.

Conker blinked and wagged his tail a bit. "Um, how about telling me what's going on?" He replied, scritching behind his flappy ear.

Gregg scoffed and produced a piece of paper from out of nowhere. "Let's see here. Conker. Died from digestion inside a crocodile's stomach. What a way to go. Well, at least it was better than how I died, bloody cats. Drowned me in their piss they did! That's why I hate those bloody things! They tried to kill me with the smell of their shit, but it didn't work! Their piss did it though!" Gregg proclaimed, swinging his scythe around.

Conker semi-listened to Gregg's rant, just brushing himself off and waiting for him to finish. "Yeah, ok. Cats killed you. So, what about me?" He asked, tapping his foot.

"Oh you sodding squirrel...alright. Now, it seems that something is going on in your world. Someone's turned the inhabitants of your pissing little world into hungry-for-squirrel monsters. So, if you want to stop from getting eaten, you need to find out who it is and stop them. But before you do, see if you can get those monster to eat some of those bloody cats! Wait...then I'LL have to deal with them! Forget the cats! Now. You'll want to stock up on those bloody squirrel's tails because you're going to be food many times on this little gay quest. Speaking of gay, some of these monsters are horny, so prepare your ass to be pounded." Gregg explained, reading off his paper.

Conker's eyes went wide. "Wait, I'm going to be eaten and f*eep*ed by...dammit, I hate these sensors, creatures from all over? What the f*eep*?!" Conker shouted before pulling out a gun.

A shot went off, followed by a scream. "There, that should take care of those fucking sensors."

Gregg cleared his throat. "Can we get back to the matter at hand, squirrel?" Gregg asked, annoyed.

Conker nodded slowly. "Sorry. I'm having trouble getting what you're telling me into my head." Conker explained.

Gregg replied by smacking Conker on the head with his scythe. "There, now it's in your head! So, your job, kill the guy responsible. That should stop the spell. Also, the Panther-type king has been revived. Seems he was brought back to life by duct taping his chest back together." Gregg said, scratching his noodle.

Conker turned away, as if looking to a camera facing him. "Well, they say duct tape fixes everything."

Gregg looked more confused. "Who are you talking to?"

"No one." Conker replied, turning back to Gregg.

"Alright. Now, if you don't mind, I'd like to put you back on Earth now. But take your time. The longer you take, the greater the chance those bloody cats may skip an appointment and use one of their extra lives!"

Conker nodded and pretended to move in slow motion towards a squirrel's tail hanging off a hook. When he finally hit it, a large skeletal hand grabbed him and pulled him out of Gregg's lair.

When Conker came to again, he was...
13222112.title: A new mission apparently

15.content: So, where does Conker wake up to?
15.title: Other places to wake up

choices: Conker is moved to a new pot
Conker is left in the pot
Conker is taken out and put on a plate
152.content:
Conker's vision was surrounded by darkness. He began to wonder if he had even opened his eyes, and if he did, had he become blind due to the alcohol. He was also feeling wet from his chest down to his feet, and he was sitting on something hard and warm. His surroundings were warm and getting hotter, and the water, now mixed with vomit began to bubble some. The confused squirrel moved his limbs to find he was entirely surrounded by the thing that he was sitting on.

A number of things ran through Conker's mind as he tried to figure out where he was. The sound of a fire crackling all around him filled his ears as the water's temperature rose higher, causing Conker to pant and sweat. "Oh God...I'm in a cooking pot!" he shouted, slamming his fists on the sides of the pot.

"Hey! Someone! Help me! Get me out of this thing!" Conker screamed as he smashed his paws into the side of the pitch black cooking pot.

A voice, muffled from being further away came into range of his hearing. "Ooh...sounds like my delicious meal has woken up!"

The lid of the pot lifted away, the sudden light causing Conker to wince and close his eyes. Whatever it was sniffed at him and sprinkled what he guessed was salt over his head. "Oh, it seems my tasty squirrel has vomited in the water!" said whoever was cooking him.

Conker whimpered, wondering what more could happen now.
152.title: Waking up as Squirrel Stew

info.description:
Conker's waking up from a night of partying again and finds himself on the menu of everyone he meets. Where he is, how he gets eaten, where he's going, and what happens to him is intirely up to you.

But there are a few rules to follow:

1) Soft oral vore only
2) Conker must remain prey only. Conker is not allowed to swallow anyone
3) Since some characters are a lot bigger than Conker, giants and giantesses are allowed
4) Non-fatal cooking is allowed
5) Sex is allowed, both M/F and M/M with M/M preferred
6) Digestion is allowed
7) Cursing and scat are allowed
8) Reforming or death are both allowed.
9) No humans, original characters allowed
10) Have fun and please add!

All Conker related material (C) Rareware.
